page.topic: Editing a Tabbed GridLinker Button Template

section.description: Web publishing applications only. The tabbed gridlinker applies a default style to the tabs that appear above child grids. For each grid that has one or more child grids:

step.description: check the Grid Properties > Customize tab button template field.
Click the '...' button in the Grid Properties > Tab button template field to display the Customize Tab Button Template dialog box.
Edit the parameters of the style tag. Remember that each attribute setting pair is separated by a colon ":" and terminated by a semicolon ";".
Click OK to save your work and return to the Tabbed GridLinker Builder.
